Week 1: 2 x 12-16 alt, Rest 30 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 2 x 18-20 alt, Rest 30 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 2 x 20-24 alt, Rest 30 seconds between sets.

Week 1: 3 x 20 seconds e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 3 x 30 seconds e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 3 x 40 seconds e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Make it harder: Support a small weight on the hips or back.

Week 1: 3 x 20-24 alt, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 3 x 24-30 alt, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 3 x 30-40 alt, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Make it easier: Go lighter or do body-weight Russian twist.
Perform on the floor with just a mat (optional).
Make it harder: Add a 1- to 2-second pause at the top.
